name: @raydeck/dependency-tree-resolver
description: An easy-to-use library to resolve dependencies in a dependency tree
author: Shai Lachmanovich <lachmanovich@gmail.com>

scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --readme _base.md --mode file --excludeNotExported --includeVersion --out docstemp && rm README.md ; concat-md docstemp > README.md && rm -rf docstemp
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn docs && git commit README.md -m "docs: updating documentation" ; git push && yarn build
